Booking Types:    

ADULT ORDER OF COMMITMENT
BAIL ORDER (CIRCUIT/SUPERIOR)
DIVERSION ORDER
DRUG COURT 
ELECTRONIC BENCH WARRANT
HOLD SHEET
IAD AGREEMENT PROBATION/PAROLE (VIOLATION/DETENTION ORDER) 
PROTECTIVE CUSTODY
SUPERIOR COURT MITTIMUS  

Sentence Statuses:   

ADMIN TRANSFER
DIVERSION
DUAL
IAD INMATE
PRETRIAL
SENTENCED 
    
<br>

# Overview

```{r}
data1 <- adm_all %>%
  filter(county == "Rockingham") %>%
  select(id,
         booking_id,
         charge_code,
         charge_desc,
         booking_type,
         booking_type_standard,
         sentence_status,
         release_type
         ) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  group_by(#charge_code,
           #charge_desc,
           booking_type,
           booking_type_standard,
           sentence_status,
           release_type) %>%
  summarise(total = n()) %>% 
  arrange(booking_type_standard)

# Custom function for booking recordings table
# Shows how each county records things differently
(table1 <- fnc_reactable_booking_recordings(data1))
```
